RHODE ISLAND ON LOVECRAFT by Grant, Donald M. and Thomas P. Hadley Used Paperback Show Details Description: Providence, RI: Grant-Hadley, 1945. Softcover. Very good-/No jacket issued. Betty Wells Halladay. Rhode Island on Lovecraft by Grant, Donald M.; Thomas P. Hadley Used Paperback first Show Details Description: Providence: Grant-Hadley, 1945. First edition, Chapbook (stapled wraps), Very Good/Near Fine,. Providence: Grant-Hadley:, 1945. First edition, Chapbook (stapled wraps), Very Good/Near Fine, 26 pp.
Covers sunned at extremities. Comes with envelope "bound" in hardcover and replete with foil stamping t spine reading "RHODE ISLAND ON LOVECRAFT - GRANT & HADLEY. eds." Show Details Description: Providence, RI: Grant-Hadley, 1945. Book. Very good- condition. Paperback. Octavo (8vo). 26 pages of text; 22.4cm; green paper wrapper faded with stain to bottom corner; H.
